vendor_name: Waipouli Beach Resort & Spa Kauai by OUTRIGGER
title: Kauai Oceanfront Bliss Overlooking Waipouli Beach with Heated River-Style Pool, Water Slides & Beach Club
description:
Escape to the golden shores of Kauai, lovingly referred to as the ‘Garden Island’ thanks to its verdant greenery and lost-world scenery. This beachfront resort has everything you need for a relaxing stay, including five onsite restaurants, a heated river-style pool that winds through the property - complete with water slides - and a lavish day spa. 

Savour authentic Hawaiian cuisine at the onsite Oasis on the Beach restaurant, serving local ingredients and seafood, or enjoy a cocktail while listening to the waves crash on the sand at Lava Lava Beach Club. For the adventurous, the resort offers easy access to the island's famous hiking trails, waterfalls and snorkelling spots dotted around the island.
